research_intro.title: University of Washington Social Media for Youth Research
research_intro.description: The current version of the app is still in beta and is only available to participants in our research study. If you‚Äôre interested, please use the links below to sign up or log in.
research_intro.has_account: I already signed up and received my account information.
research_intro.has_not_account: Great, I‚Äôd like to sign up for the study
research_intro.someting_else_description: If you signed up for the study but haven‚Äôt received your account information yet, please allow a couple of days for us to get back to you. If you still don‚Äôt hear from us, feel free to reach out via:

forgot_password.title: Forgot Password
forgot_password.description: We'll email you instructions to reset your password.
forgot_password.email_guide: You have to enter your exact email address that you used to register.

sign_up.email_guide: You will need to verify your email later.
sign_up.password_constraints: The password must be at least 8 characters with a mix of upper and lowercase letters, numbers and symbols.
sign_up.research_desc: <0>WhoAmI Today is a non-profit service developed by a group of researchers at the University of Washington to make social media more aligned with the needs of adolescents. If you agree to the<1>privacy policy/consent form</1>, you agree to participating in our research, which includes the (aggregated and deidentified) analysis of your data.</0>
sign_up.agree_to_research: agree (optional, unless you are currently participating in the research led by Univ. of Washington research team).
sign_up.i_agree_to_provide_consent_to_my_child‚Ä: I agree to provide consent to my child‚Äôs participation in the research.
sign_up.printing_your_name_below: Printing your name below will act as a signature to consent to the information above.
sign_up.data_security_guide: The data we collect will be confidential and will not be stored with your name. All data and audio and recordings will be stored securely.
sign_up.noti_on_desc: Would you like to get a notification from WhoAmI?
sign_up.noti_time_setting_desc_1: Once a day, you will write a new WhoAmI.
sign_up.noti_time_setting_desc_2: When do you want to get the notification?
sign_up.noti_time_default_desc: If you do not set a time, you will be notified at 4 p.m.
sign_up.error:
A temporary error occurred while signing up:( 
 Please sign up again.
